channel.title: Forever ending day
channel.description:
What happened? Day did not end after hanging NK, when I left the game, no option to reconnect
What was SUPPOSED to happen? Day should've ended and game should've went to night phase
Steps to reproduce: No clue
Comments: https://www.dropbox.com/s/svui25mtla5v3x9/output_log.txt?dl=0
